io.atomix.utils

Interface Managed<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - managed type
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    ManagedBroadcastService, ManagedClusterCommunicationService, ManagedClusterEventService, ManagedClusterMembershipService, ManagedMemberGroupService, ManagedMessagingService, ManagedNodeDiscoveryService, ManagedPartitionGroupMembershipService, ManagedPartitionService, ManagedPrimaryElection, ManagedPrimaryElectionService, ManagedPrimitiveRegistry, ManagedPrimitivesService, ManagedSessionIdService, ManagedTransactionService
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Atomix, AtomixCluster, PrimaryBackupServer

    public interface Managed<T>
    Interface for types that can be asynchronously started and stopped.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean isRunning()
      Returns a boolean value indicating whether the managed object is running.
      CompletableFuture<T> start()
      Starts the managed object.
      CompletableFuture<Void> stop()
      Stops the managed object.

    • Method Detail

      • start

        CompletableFuture<T> start()
        Starts the managed object.
        Returns:
        A completable future to be completed once the object has been started.

      • isRunning

        boolean isRunning()
        Returns a boolean value indicating whether the managed object is running.
        Returns:
        Indicates whether the managed object is running.

      • stop

        CompletableFuture<Void> stop()
        Stops the managed object.
        Returns:
        A completable future to be completed once the object has been stopped.
